backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, label settings, and print jobs with authorization checks and serial-duplicate prevention.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of key frontend files across tabs, stores, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions defining light and dark mode CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML root file loading the React app entrypoint with a root div and module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main App component providing global error boundary and password-session gating to show LockScreen or AppShell.
frontend/src/audio/soundSystem.ts: Zustand-based sound settings store with custom sound support and Web Audio playback utilities.
frontend/src/auth/passwordSession.ts: LocalStorage-backed session utilities for password validation, expiration, and session lifecycle.
frontend/src/auth/PasswordSessionProvide: Context provider managing password session state, validation, locking, and unlock logic.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Main layout component providing header, tab navigation, and footer, switching between scan, settings, devices, and diagnostics tabs.
frontend/src/components/BackendAvailabil: Displays a destructive badge when the backend is unavailable based on availability state.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and shows a fallback UI with a refresh option.
frontend/src/components/HeaderDeviceCont: Shows printer connection status and a wake-lock toggle if supported.
frontend/src/components/SerialTypeCounte: Displays print counters per label prefix mapping, showing skeletons while loading or empty state when no mappings exist.
frontend/src/components/SoundEffectsSett: UI for configuring sound effects, including selecting, testing, uploading, and removing custom sounds.
frontend/src/config/lockScreenConfig.ts: Provides expected lock-screen password, using an env override or a default value.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for submitting print jobs, retrieving print history, and increasing print counts with backend availability handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: React hook that manages screen wake lock support, activation, persistence, and visibility-based reactivation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theming variables, base styles, focus states, and touch-friendly sizing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity, and rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/printing/barcodePreview.ts: Generates simple deterministic SVG barcodes from serial data as a visual preview replacement for jsbarcode.
frontend/src/printing/cpclGenerator.ts: Builds CPCL printer commands for test prints and full label generation based on layout and prefix settings.
frontend/src/printing/LabelPreview.tsx: UI component that previews label layouts with zoom controls and sample serial inputs using pixel-converted layout settings.
frontend/src/screens/LockScreen.tsx: Password entry screen handling unlock attempts, error feedback, and input focus management.
frontend/src/screens/PasswordSessionWiri: Displays configuration error guidance with refresh option when password session wiring fails.
frontend/src/services/printerService.ts: Zustand store managing USB/Bluetooth printer connections, CPCL sending, test prints, and connection state.
frontend/src/services/usbCpclTransport.t: Implements WebUSB-based CPCL printer discovery, connection, and endpoint selection with type definitions and a helper to request a printer.
frontend/src/state/backendAvailabilitySt: Zustand store tracking backend availability, errors, and timestamps with actions to update or reset state.
frontend/src/state/diagnosticsStore.ts: Persistent Zustand store tracking scan, print, and error counts plus per-type counters with increment actions.
frontend/src/state/labelSettingsStore.ts: Persistent store for label settings including BigInt-safe storage, default layouts, and migration from older formats.
frontend/src/state/logStore.ts: Persistent log store maintaining timestamped messages with capped history and an API to add logs.
frontend/src/state/printHistoryStore.ts: Persistent print history store with reprint support using the printer service and logging/diagnostics updates.
frontend/src/tabs/DevicesTab.tsx: UI tab for selecting connection method and managing printer connection, disconnection, and test prints.
frontend/src/tabs/DiagnosticsTab.tsx: UI tab showing diagnostics stats, print history with reprint, and filtered system logs.
frontend/src/tabs/LabelSettingsTab.tsx: React UI for editing label dimensions, barcode settings, prefix mappings, and layout settings, with import/export and save handling.
frontend/src/tabs/ScanPrintTab.tsx: Manages serial scanning, type detection, validation, and printing workflow, including backend submission and printer communication.
frontend/src/utils/icErrors.ts: Utilities to detect IC canister-stopped errors and format IC-related error messages for user display.
frontend/src/utils/labelSettingsErrors.t: Parses label settings update errors and converts them into user-friendly messages, handling auth, network, and prefix issues.
frontend/src/utils/labelSettingsImportEx: Handles export, import, validation, and migration of label settings, including BigInt-safe serialization.
frontend/src/utils/labelTypes.ts: Defines built-in label types and utilities for deriving display names and combining built-in and custom types.
frontend/src/utils/scanPrintErrors.ts: Formats scan-and-print backend and printer errors into concise messages and detects non-blocking backend failures.
frontend/src/utils/serialNormalization.t: Normalizes scanned serials by trimming whitespace and removing scanner suffix characters.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters (including hash routing), storing and retrieving them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s build state, architecture, known issues, and feature inventory for the barcode and label printing system.
